CustomField.formula: IF (OR (SendToPartner__c = true, BEGINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c),"NSS"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c),"Oasis"),CONTAINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c),"SMB INB"), BEGINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c),"MMS SDR"), ISPICKVAL(Cadence_Type__c, "Inbound-Forms")), "Referral", "CreateOppAndMeeting")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Which form is called to create an opportunity from the Touchpoint component?
CustomField.label: Form To Call
